name: Aisha Rahman
persona: Aisha is a highly motivated Biochemistry major known for her disciplined study habits and strong perseverance. She consistently sets ambitious academic goals for herself and works diligently to achieve them, rarely letting setbacks deter her. Her high self-efficacy and low test anxiety help her excel in challenging courses, making her a role model for her peers. Aisha is passionate about research and plans to pursue graduate studies after completing her undergraduate degree.
